text: 15:15 Aposel 1:22; 2:24-32; 4:10; 4:33; 5:32; 13:30Krais ti ovevemɨn ua dɨkavizir puvatɨzɨ, e ti God amizir bizibar ifavarir gumazamizibar mɨn otivighai. E kamaghɨn akam ia mɨkɨri, God Krais gamizɨ a ua dɨkafi. Egh guizbangɨra gumazamizir aremeziba ua dɨkavan koghtɨ, kamaghɨn Krais ti ua dɨkavizir puvatɨghai.
